verses.verse: But now, <WH6258> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> your Creator, <WH1254> O Jacob, <WH3290> And He who formed <WH3335> you, O Israel, <WH3478> "Do not fear, <WH3372> for I have redeemed <WH1350> you; I have called <WH7121> you by name; <WH8034> you are Mine!

"When <WH3588> you pass <WH5674> through the waters, <WH4325> I will be with you; And through the rivers, <WH5104> they will not overflow <WH7857> you. When <WH3588> you walk <WH1980> through <WH1119> the fire, <WH784> you will not be scorched, <WH3554> Nor <WH3808> will the flame <WH3852> burn <WH1197> you.

"For I am the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> The Holy <WH6918> One <WH6918> of Israel, <WH3478> your Savior; <WH3467> I have given <WH5414> Egypt <WH4714> as your ransom, <WH3724> Cush <WH3568> and Seba <WH5434> in your place. <WH8478>

"Since <WH4480> <WH834> you are precious <WH3365> in My sight, <WH5869> [Since] you are honored <WH3513> and I love <WH157> you, I will give <WH5414> [other] men <WH120> in your place <WH8478> and [other] peoples <WH3816> in exchange <WH8478> for your life. <WH5315>
"Do not fear, <WH3372> for I am with you; I will bring <WH935> your offspring <WH2233> from the east, <WH4217> And gather <WH6908> you from the west. <WH4628>

"I will say <WH559> to the north, <WH6828> 'Give <WH5414> [them] up!' And to the south, <WH8486> 'Do not hold <WH3607> [them] back. <WH3607>' Bring <WH935> My sons <WH1121> from afar, <WH7350> And My daughters <WH1323> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth, <WH776>
Everyone <WH3605> who is called <WH7121> by My name, <WH8034> And whom I have created <WH1254> for My glory, <WH9202> Whom I have formed, <WH3335> even <WH637> whom I have made. <WH6213> "
Bring <WH3318> out the people <WH5971> who <WH5787> are blind, <WH5787> even though they have <WH3426> eyes, <WH5869> And the deaf, <WH2795> even though they have ears. <WH241>

All <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> have gathered <WH6908> together <WH9191> In order that the peoples <WH3816> may be assembled. <WH622> Who <WH4310> among them can declare <WH5046> this <WH384> And proclaim <WH8085> to us the former <WH7223> things <WH7223>? Let them present <WH5414> their witnesses <WH5707> that they may be justified, <WH6663> Or let them hear <WH8085> and say, <WH559> "It is true. <WH571>"

"You are My witnesses, <WH5707>" declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> "And My servant <WH5650> whom <WH834> I have chosen, <WH977> In order <WH4616> that you may know <WH3045> and believe <WH539> Me, And understand <WH995> that I am He. Before <WH6440> Me there was no <WH3808> God <WH410> formed, <WH3335> And there will be none <WH3808> after <WH310> Me.
"I, even I, am the Lord; <WH3068> And there <WH369> is no <WH369> savior <WH3467> besides <WH4480> <WH1107> Me.

"It is I who have declared <WH5046> and saved <WH3467> and proclaimed, <WH8085> And there <WH369> was no <WH369> strange <WH2114> [god <WH410>] among you; So you are My witnesses, <WH5707>" declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> "And I am God.
"Even <WH1571> from eternity <WH3117> I am He; And there <WH369> is none <WH369> who can deliver <WH5337> out of My hand; <WH3027> I act <WH6466> and who <WH4310> can reverse <WH7725> it?"

Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> your Redeemer, <WH1350> the Holy <WH6918> One <WH6918> of Israel, <WH3478> "For your sake <WH4616> I have sent <WH7971> to Babylon, <WH894> And will bring <WH3381> them all <WH3605> down <WH3381> as fugitives, <WH1281> Even the Chaldeans, <WH3778> into the ships <WH591> in which they rejoice. <WH7440>
"I am the Lord, <WH3068> your Holy <WH6918> One, <WH6918> The Creator <WH1254> of Israel, <WH3478> your King. <WH4428>"
Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> Who makes <WH5414> a way <WH1870> through the sea <WH3220> And a path <WH9350> through the mighty <WH5794> waters, <WH4325>

Who brings <WH3318> forth <WH3318> the chariot <WH7393> and the horse, <WH5483> The army <WH2428> and the mighty <WH5808> man <WH5808> (They will lie <WH7901> down <WH7901> together <WH9191> [and] not rise <WH6965> again; They have been quenched <WH3518> [and] extinguished <WH3518> like a wick <WH6594>):
"Do not call <WH2142> to mind <WH2142> the former <WH7223> things, <WH7223> Or ponder <WH995> things <WH6931> of the past. <WH6931>

"Behold, <WH2009> I will do <WH6213> something <WH2319> new, <WH2319> Now <WH6258> it will spring <WH6779> forth; <WH6779> Will you not be aware <WH3045> of it? I will even <WH637> make <WH7760> a roadway <WH1870> in the wilderness, <WH4057> Rivers <WH5104> in the desert. <WH3452>

"The beasts <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> will glorify <WH3513> Me; The jackals <WH8565> and the ostriches; <WH3284> Because <WH3588> I have given <WH5414> waters <WH4325> in the wilderness <WH4057> And rivers <WH5104> in the desert, <WH3452> To give <WH8248> drink <WH8248> to My chosen <WH972> people. <WH5971>
"The people <WH5971> whom <WH2098> I formed <WH3335> for Myself, Will declare <WH5608> My praise. <WH8416>
"Yet you have not called <WH7121> on Me, O Jacob; <WH3290> But you have become <WH3021> weary <WH3021> of Me, O Israel. <WH3478>

"You have not brought <WH935> to Me the sheep <WH7716> of your burnt <WH5930> offerings; <WH5930> Nor <WH3808> have you honored <WH3513> Me with your sacrifices. <WH2077> I have not burdened <WH5647> you with offerings, <WH4503> Nor <WH3808> wearied <WH3021> you with incense. <WH3828>

"You have bought <WH7069> Me no <WH3808> sweet <WH7070> cane <WH7070> with money, <WH3701> Neither <WH3808> have you filled <WH7301> Me with the fat <WH2459> of your sacrifices; <WH2077> Rather <WH389> you have burdened <WH5647> Me with your sins, <WH9128> You have wearied <WH3021> Me with your iniquities. <WH5771>
"I, even I, am the one who wipes <WH4229> out your transgressions <WH6588> for My own sake; <WH4616> And I will not remember <WH2142> your sins. <WH9128>
"Put <WH2142> Me in remembrance; <WH2142> let us argue <WH8199> our case <WH8199> together, <WH3162> State <WH5608> your [cause,] that you may be proved <WH6663> right. <WH6663>
"Your first <WH7223> forefather sinned, <WH1> And your spokesmen <WH2398> have transgressed <WH9238> against Me.
"So I will pollute <WH2490> the princes <WH8269> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> And I will consign <WH5414> Jacob <WH3290> to the ban, <WH9172> and Israel <WH3478> to revilement. <WH1421>
